City Secretary

Jeannette Hugghins

Phone (210) 494-2023 Ext. 222


click here to email

The Administration Office is responsible for many things including:

  • Agendas & Minutes
  • Economic Development
  • Municipal Court
  • Permits & Fees
  • Public Records Requests (see below)
  • Ordinances, resolutions, agreements, and other city documents
  • Board/Committee applications and appointments (see below)
  • Municipal elections

City records are preserved in compliance with the Texas State Library and Archives Commission Records Retention Schedule.

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

Public Record Requests:  complete the form below and email to jhugghins@hollywoodpark-tx.gov or fax to (210) 494-7859.

Public Information Request Form

For additional information on the Texas Public Information Act click on this link.

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

Interested in Serving on a Town board?

Curious to know how the board application and appointment process works?  You can read the policy here.

The Town of Hollywood Park is always accepting applications for boards.  If you are not sure what board to serve on, you can read a summarized description of each board.  Please follow the deadlines in the descriptions to submit your application in time for a regular term.  Anyone interested in serving, including incumbent board members, must complete an application and turn it in to the City Secretary’s office in person or via email, in order to be considered for a board position.
